name: Battle Army
description:
Battle Army is a multiplayer FPS, giving players the ability to change the weapons and equipment of their characters. Immerse yourself in a nervous universe, aggressive and manageable at the same time.
Run through many battlefields to fulfill the set objective, kill the enemies that will block your path and accomplish your mission.
Two teams compete in different modes and varied.
In constant evolution, the Battle Army game will propose new weapons, new costumes or new cards so that players of all levels can create unique and different characters.Features Of the GameCharacter customization
3 Game Modes
Fps Easy to handle
Playable Up 6 Vs 6
4 Dynamic Battle Cards
An Interactive Menu to Prepare Before the Battle
20 Levels
Customization Classes
A Ranking
Silver system (the more you play the more you are rich)Where Is the Development Of Battle Army?
Battle Army is currently playable alpha version released in early access on Steam in early 2018.
The basics of the game are ready and will be soon improved, balanced if necessary based on player feedback.
With your participation and your constructive criticism, we will evolve Battle Army, we will add new equipment, new maps, new mods and much more ...
We develop the game with you thanks to our forum where you can post your ideas
Support the Battle Army video game to start a new adventure.
